StarredVersesModel Class Reference

This class is an implementation of a model from the Qt Model/View framework for a list view which represents the verses the user has starred. More...

#include <StarredVersesModel.h>

Detailed Description

This class is an implementation of a model from the Qt Model/View framework for a list view which represents the verses the user has starred.
